scripts.generate:all: pnpm generate:schema && pnpm generate:python && pnpm generate:conversions && pnpm generate:field-configs && pnpm generate:zod-schemas && pnpm generate:static-nodes && pnpm generate:graphql-types && pnpm generate:frontend-mappings && pnpm generate:entities && pnpm build
scripts.generate:all:quiet: QUIET=true pnpm generate:schema > /dev/null && QUIET=true pnpm generate:python > /dev/null && QUIET=true pnpm generate:conversions > /dev/null && QUIET=true pnpm generate:field-configs > /dev/null && QUIET=true pnpm generate:zod-schemas > /dev/null && QUIET=true pnpm generate:static-nodes > /dev/null && QUIET=true pnpm generate:graphql-types > /dev/null && QUIET=true pnpm generate:frontend-mappings > /dev/null && QUIET=true pnpm generate:entities && pnpm build > /dev/null 2>&1
